tool_description: Create AI art with image style transfer. Turn selfies, pet photos, and other images into personalized art. Web interface: https://hotpot.ai/personalize-art
name: AI Art Maker
title: AI Art Maker

api_list.name: AI Art Personalizer
api_list.description: Turn pictures into personalized art with AI. Invigorate boring selfies, pet photos, and vacation pictures by reimagining them with different artistic styles. From Van Gogh to pixel art to Chinese paintings, mix and match disparate styles to generate captivating, customized images.
